text: John and Mary is a 1969 American romantic drama movie. It was directed by Peter Yates. It was based on the novel of the same name by Mervyn Jones. It stars Dustin Hoffman, Mia Farrow, Tyne Daly, Olympia Dukakis, Stanley Beck, Michael Tolan. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1969 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Peter Yates Category:Movies set in New York City
title: John and Mary (movie)
